$interpreted: Aosta: What are you trying to do stealing other people's specimens?
PAFF: Steal?... A-are you talking about Garu?
PAFF: No...I-I didn't...
Aosta: You're the thief; of course you won't admit your crimes.
Aosta: Since you have the guts to proceed with your thievery, I assume you're prepared to pay the price for it, right?
Experiment: Gaaaaoooo!!!
PAFF: Garu! ......
Aosta: Are you, protecting her?
Experiment: Gaaoo~
Aosta: ...Looks like you were indeed speaking truthfully. I misunderstood you.
Aosta: Judging from your outfit, you're not from Kingdom of the Sun, are you?
PAFF: Yes...I come from Node 08.
Aosta: ...Is that some remote countryside? Never even heard of it.
PAFF: N-no way...So this place really is far away from Node 08...?  Miss Nolva also never heard of it...
Aosta: Nolva...Nolva Carpenter?
PAFF: You...Do you know Miss Nolva as well?
Aosta: I don't exactly know her...She was diagnosed with a special kind of disease. She's more or less my patient.
PAFF: Miss Nolva mentioned this before. Could it be, that you're... Dr. Clovis?
Aosta: I am indeed.
PAFF: What a coincidence...
PAFF: Ummm, I know this may seem to come out of nowhere...
PAFF: I heard that you're a very good doctor. Is it possible that you could help cure my amnesia?
Aosta: Did you lose your memory?
PAFF: That...it happened a long time ago. My memories before 15 years old, all of them...
Aosta: ...That sounds quite tough.
PAFF: No, it's alright...I've...gotten used to it already.
PAFF: However, recently, I lost another piece of my memory again. I want to try to remember it.
PAFF: If I can do that, perhaps I can find the reason why I came to this world...
Aosta: Came to this world?
PAFF: Yes. I came to this world...
PAFF: ...Nora said that this might be magic...

PAFF: I'm not sure what actually happened either.
Everyone just suddenly appeared in this world...
Aosta: ......
Aosta: (The Soul Energy fluctuation I just felt, maybe they're the ones who caused it...)
Aosta: (No wonder MX46 would...hmm, interesting...)
PAFF: Dr. Clovis...?
Aosta: ...Retrieving memories is not my field of expertise. You came to the wrong person.
PAFF: I'm so sorry... I was so rude to ask such favor from you...
Aosta: However, if what you said was the truth, then it's too risky for you to wander around this foreign land all by yourself.
Aosta: MX46.
Experiment: Gaarrr~ rruuu~
Aosta: Before you find your friends, let MX46 accompany you.
PAFF: F-For real?
Experiment: GAAOO!!!!
Aosta: Looks like MX46 has already answered it for me.
PAFF: ...Thank you so much!

Aosta: No need. I still have research I need to deal with.
I'll be taking my leave now.
PAFF: That's great news, Garu...we can be together for a bit longer!
Experiment: Garrrr~ ruuuu~ Garrrr~ ruuuu~

Model.Text: What are you trying to do stealing other people's specimens?
Steal?... A-are you talking about Garu?
No...I-I didn't...
You're the thief; of course you won't admit your crimes.
Since you have the guts to proceed with your thievery, I assume you're prepared to pay the price for it, right?
Gaaaaoooo!!!
Are you, protecting her?
Gaaoo~
...Looks like you were indeed speaking truthfully. I misunderstood you.
Judging from your outfit, you're not from Kingdom of the Sun, are you?
Yes...I come from Node 08.
...Is that some remote countryside? Never even heard of it.
N-no way...So this place really is far away from Node 08...?  Miss Nolva also never heard of it...
Nolva...Nolva Carpenter?
You...Do you know Miss Nolva as well?
I don't exactly know her...She was diagnosed with a special kind of disease. She's more or less my patient.
Miss Nolva mentioned this before. Could it be, that you're... Dr. Clovis?
I am indeed.
What a coincidence...
Ummm, I know this may seem to come out of nowhere...
I heard that you're a very good doctor. Is it possible that you could help cure my amnesia?
Did you lose your memory?
That...it happened a long time ago. My memories before 15 years old, all of them...
...That sounds quite tough.
No, it's alright...I've...gotten used to it already.
However, recently, I lost another piece of my memory again. I want to try to remember it.
If I can do that, perhaps I can find the reason why I came to this world...
Came to this world?
Yes. I came to this world...
...Nora said that this might be magic...

I'm not sure what actually happened either.
Everyone just suddenly appeared in this world...
(The Soul Energy fluctuation I just felt, maybe they're the ones who caused it...)
(No wonder MX46 would...hmm, interesting...)
Dr. Clovis...?
...Retrieving memories is not my field of expertise. You came to the wrong person.
I'm so sorry... I was so rude to ask such favor from you...
However, if what you said was the truth, then it's too risky for you to wander around this foreign land all by yourself.
MX46.
Gaarrr~ rruuu~
Before you find your friends, let MX46 accompany you.
F-For real?
GAAOO!!!!
Looks like MX46 has already answered it for me.
...Thank you so much!

No need. I still have research I need to deal with.
I'll be taking my leave now.
That's great news, Garu...we can be together for a bit longer!
Garrrr~ ruuuu~ Garrrr~ ruuuu~
